name: opencode-type-inject
description: Auto-injects TypeScript types into file reads and provides type lookup tools to help LLMs understand your codebase's type structure better.

installation.summary: Install via npm and enable in OpenCode TypeScript projects.
installation.markdown:
## Installation

```bash
npm install opencode-type-inject
```

Add to your OpenCode config:

```json
{
  "plugins": ["opencode-type-inject"]
}
```

Restart OpenCode to enable automatic type injection.

usage.markdown:
## Usage

The plugin automatically:

1. **Injects Types**: When the LLM reads TypeScript files, type definitions are automatically injected into the context
2. **Type Lookup**: Provides tools for the LLM to query type information
3. **Better Understanding**: Helps the LLM make more type-aware code suggestions

No manual configuration needed - just install and go!
